Classes in edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool used by edu.umich.auth.cosign.pool

          This class manages all the activities related to a Cosign connection.

          This class is a wrapper class to the GenericObjectPool;
CosignConnectionPoolManager
          This class manages the all the Cosign connection pools.
CosignSSLSocketFactory
          This singleton class creates SSL Sockets for Cosign connections.
